tasks.title: Remove legacy TASK_LIST.md and TASK_ARCHIVE.md
tasks.description:
Remove the legacy task management files now that we use the merge-friendly task system.

Files to remove:
- TASK_LIST.md (18KB)
- TASK_ARCHIVE.md (14KB)

Scripts to update/remove:
- scripts/validate_task_list.py - Remove (validates legacy format)
- scripts/migrate_legacy_tasks.py - Remove (migration complete)
- scripts/select_task.py - Update to use tasks/*.json
- scripts/task_graph.py - Update to use tasks/*.json
- scripts/consolidate_tasks.py - Already uses new format, verify

CI changes:
- .github/workflows/ci.yml: Remove validate-task-list job (or update to validate tasks/*.json)

Documentation updates needed:
- CLAUDE.md: Update task management references
- docs/definition-of-done.md: Update TASK_LIST.md references
- docs/merge-friendly-tasks.md: Mark as primary system
- CONTRIBUTING.md: Update task references
- Multiple other docs (see grep results)

Pre-requisites:

- Verify legacy_migration.json captures historical context
tasks.retrospective: Successfully removed TASK_LIST.md and TASK_ARCHIVE.md. Updated scripts to handle missing files gracefully. Updated CLAUDE.md and skill docs to reference new task system. All historical tasks preserved in tasks/legacy_migration.json.
